title: The Pandemic and War — Not Government Spending — Caused Inflation, According to Nobel Prize Winner
description:
A new paper by Ira Regmi and Joseph Stiglitz has huge implications for everything about who holds power in American life.

The post The Pandemic and War — Not Government Spending — Caused Inflation, According to Nobel Prize Winner appeared first on The Intercept.

title: Incarcerated People Forced to Do Dangerous Work for "Slave" Wages at Height of Pandemic
description:
New documents show the extent of the prison labor in New York, including jobs like asbestos removal.
